name: MultiDark pools: yiimp, zpool and more!
description:
When you're mining cryptocurrency in the dark, your eyes are accustomed to it, so opening bright sites makes you blind. This little style helps your eyes be healthy while visiting many pools.
Supported sites:
- yiimp.eu
- antminepool.com
- pool.coin-miners.info
- crc.cryptopros.us
- futurecoins.club
- pool.hashrefinery.com
- pool.nosekefik.com
- zpool.ca
- mpool.mooo.com
- arcpool.com
- bsod.pw
- pool.minertopia.org
- umine.org
- miningpool.shop
- phi-phi-pool.net
- cryptopool.xyz
- datapaw.net
- erstweal.com
- strakspool.com
- pickaxe.pro
- unimining.net
- ahashpool.com

- cryptonova.eu

- zergpool.com

- hive.gulfcoastmining.com
